Method Detail

getTransferConfig

public any getTransferConfig([string datasourcePath=''], [string configPath=''], [string definitionPath=''], DatasourceBean dsnBean, [string configClassPath='transfer.com.config.Configuration'])
Get a Transfer Config Object with ColdBox settings.

Parameters:
datasourcePath - The transfer datasource file path, in our case, not needed.
configPath - The transfer configuration file path
definitionPath - The transfer definition path
dsnBean - The coldbox datasource bean
configClassPath - The default transfer configuration object. Alter at will.
